h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Multi-Glazed Gourd Location
content: The Multi-Glazed Gourd can be purchased from the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain, upon completing Chapter 5 in the Flaming Mountains. Once you start Chapter 6, you can head back to his location in Bamboo Grove and grab it for 18,000 Will.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Multi-Glazed_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Multi-Glazed Gourd', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Multi-Glazed Gourd Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Multi-Glazed Gourd can be purchased from the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain, upon completing Chapter 5 in the Flaming Mountains. Once you start Chapter 6, you can head back to his location in Bamboo Grove and grab it for 18,000 Will.
